body_content.explanation: the quality of being simple, without decoration or without anything added:
examples: There's something about the plainness of the design which I like.
Richness of decoration becomes more effective when contrasted with plainness.

body_content.explanation: the fact of not being beautiful:
examples: The only women ever seen there were those whose age and plainness guaranteed respectability.

body_content.explanation: the fact of being clearly understood because of being obvious or being very honest:
examples: He told us with great plainness what we had done wrong.
To Minnesotans, there is no greater virtue than plainness: being honest, straightforward, unpretentious, plain-spoken.
